title: Setting a nickname for someone adds this person to contacts
body: When setting up a nickname for someone I dont have in contacts yet, adds this someone to my contacts list 1. open status app 2. go to any public chat, for instance # test 3. select any contact -> view profile 4. click nickname and enter some value, save As a result, this contact is being added to contacts list of mine , even I did not add it. `DBG 2021-05-24 12:15:57+03:00 Requesting
